sentences.english: Gates sat through it silently for about an hour.
sentences.chinese: 盖茨坐了约一个小时，自始至终沉默不言。

sentences.english: Throughout, she illustrates her analysis with excerpts from discussions.
sentences.chinese: 自始至终，她摘引讨论内容来阐明她的分析。

sentences.english: And yet the movement is a masterpiece of pattern designing all the time.
sentences.chinese: 莫扎特的这一乐章又自始至终是乐式设计的杰作。

sentences.english: The American way of dining is such a large plate, and one should concentrate on the plate from start to finish.
sentences.chinese: 美式餐饮就是那么一大盘，自始至终以一盘贯之。

sentences.english: But pediatricians do not consistently prescribe vitamin drops.
sentences.chinese: 但是儿科医生没有自始至终地开出维生素点滴的处方。

sentences.english: Ensure absolutely impartiality and Confidentiality throughout.
sentences.chinese: 自始至终确保完全的公正与失密。

sentences.english: We drew on her experience throughout the project .
sentences.chinese: 我们这一项目自始至终都借重她的经验。

sentences.english: She still keeps it in a drawer in her bedroom at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 自始至终，女王都把它珍藏在白金汉宫的卧室抽屉中。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful evening, but I was nervous the entire time.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个奇妙的夜晚，但我自始至终都有些心神不定。

sentences.english: Liberal arts students, they have all along and the Americans to fight in the language.
sentences.chinese: 文科类学生来说，他们自始至终都在和美国人拼语言。

sentences.english: She has been, and continues to be, a devoted public servant.
sentences.chinese: 自始至终，她都是一名勤于奉献的公务人员。

sentences.english: Rivers somehow managed to keep her sense of humor throughout.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，Rivers自始至终保持了她的幽默感。

sentences.english: It happened that she was in the group and she impressed me greatly with her friendly and lovely smile throughout the test.
sentences.chinese: 她自始至终友好而可爱的微笑给我留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.english: He retained a tender affection for his wife to the end of his life.
sentences.chinese: 他一生自始至终都对他的妻子温情脉脉。

sentences.english: The Stainless One, Pure Spirit through and through.
sentences.chinese: 自始至终的超灵，纯洁无暇的灵魂。

sentences.english: Throughout the reception, it was permeated with warm and friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 招待会自始至终洋溢着热烈友好的气氛。

definition: from start to finish/from head to tail/the whole (thing)
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
only/just (i.e. it is only that...)/all except/unique
one thread, one hair (idiom); a tiny bit/an iota
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
